verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: asked] [ARG2: 3 sex and relationship therapists] [ARG1: to demystify infidelity] and their answers will make you think differently about cheating sex and relationship therapists have a more nuanced take on infidelity than most of us do for example most people who cheat do n't actually want to leave their partners esther perel ashley madison sheri meyers tammy nelson
